mapper.select: SELECT B.WORK_DATE, SUM(A.PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY, SUM(A.MANHOUR) AS MANHOUR, SUM(B.PLAN_QTY) AS PLAN_QTY FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.ISUSABLE='Usable' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND B.WORK_DATE IN ( CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE(), 112) ,CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()-1, 112) ) GROUP BY B.WORK_DATE

SELECT A.REJECT_ITEMID, A.REJECT_TYPE, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.FACTORYID ='KEM' AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND DATEPART(MONTH,B.WORK_DATE) = #{month} GROUP BY A.REJECT_ITEMID, REJECT_TYPE ORDER BY A.REJECT_ITEMID ASC
